Class ToStringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • securitybug.similarityuniformfuzzyhash.ToStringUtils

  • public final class ToStringUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides utility methods and constants to build string representations of Uniform Fuzzy Hashes.
    Author:
    s3curitybug@gmail.com
